title: Which majors should students really consider for long-term stability? - Quora

response.answer_text: Ask yourself, where do you want to be and what do you want to be doing when you are 30 years old. It you go to a company, you will do and go what and where they ask. If you go to a profession, you go and do what is necessary to achieve acceptance. If you go to an area or community that will provide a quality of life then you major in the field that will help you the most to succeed in the community. There are good jobs with benefits and a lot of satisfaction living in a community that needs you. Iguana
